name: Doala de Wii
overview: In Doala de Wii (ドアラでWii) the Chunichi Dragons' mascot "Doala" is finally game! In the "room of Doala" of the main mode, using the Wii remote control it is possible to touch Doala on the face and legs in seven locations, producing various reactions. Play multiple mini-games with Doala.
